info.name: Patient Record System API
info.description: Complete API collection for Patient Record System with authentication, patients, medical records, and appointments

item.name: Authentication

exec: pm.test('Response time is less than 500ms', function () {

item.description: Authentication endpoints for doctor registration and login

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "email": "jane.doe@email.com",
  "phone": "+1234567892",
  "dateOfBirth": "1990-05-15",
  "gender": "female",
  "address": "123 Main St, City, State 12345",
  "bloodType": "A+",
  "allergies": ["Penicillin", "Peanuts"],
  "emergencyContact": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "relationship": "Spouse",
    "phone": "+1234567893"
  }
}

request.description: Get patient by ID with populated medical records and appointments
Search patients by name or email
Create a new medical record for a patient
Get medical record by ID with populated patient and doctor
Get all medical records for a specific patient

body.raw:
{
  "patient": "{{patientId}}",
  "dateTime": "2024-02-15T10:00:00Z",
  "duration": 30,
  "reason": "Follow-up consultation",
  "type": "follow-up",
  "notes": "Patient requested follow-up after medication adjustment"
}

request.description: Get all appointments for a specific patient
Get all appointments for a specific doctor
Get appointments within a date range
Test accessing protected route without token
Test validation with invalid email format
